page.title: 09Housing Around Steyning
page.content: The new houses in Steyning are being built at{Gatewick Park}and{Coombe {Drove.}The price of an average size semi detached in{Coombe Drove}is Â£57950 in{Ingram Road}it would be Â£53950 and{Gatewick Park}it would be Â£43000. Mainly middle-aged people live in the{Maudlyn Estate.}In the {Penland's}bungalows mainly retired people live. The houses are mainly made out of brick & stone with tiled rooves. Some houses are very old like in{Church Street}there is a small wooden thatched house. There is also one next to the fire station.There are new houses for pensioners on the corner of{Goring Road}built by Barratt homes.There are council houses in {Shooting Fields Estate.
